### [Constants](/documentation/AudioToolbox/1623673-codec-unavailable-errors#Constants)

[`var kExtAudioFileError_CodecUnavailableInputConsumed: OSStatus`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/kextaudiofileerror_codecunavailableinputconsumed)The [`ExtAudioFileWrite(_:_:_:)`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/extaudiofilewrite(_:_:_:)) function was interrupted and the last buffer that you provided was successfully written to disk.[`var kExtAudioFileError_CodecUnavailableInputNotConsumed: OSStatus`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/kextaudiofileerror_codecunavailableinputnotconsumed)The [`ExtAudioFileWrite(_:_:_:)`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/extaudiofilewrite(_:_:_:)) function was interrupted and the last buffer that you provided was *not* successfully written to disk.## [See Also](/documentation/AudioToolbox/1623673-codec-unavailable-errors#see-also)
